briefTitle: Opting for Breast Reconstruction After Mastectomy or Not: Search for Influencing Factors
officialTitle: Keuze Voor Wel of Geen Borstreconstructie na Mastectomie: Onderzoek Naar beïnvloedende Factoren
conditions: Breast Cancer Female, Mastectomy, Breast Reconstruction
primaryOutcomeMeasure: factors influencing the choice concerning breast reconstruction after mastectomy, assessed with a questionnaire (with multiple choice and open questions)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* female
* Dutch speaking
* must have undergone a mastectomy for breast cancer in the following period: 2010 - 2015
* must be a patient of the Breast Clinic at the University Hospital in Brussels

Exclusion Criteria:

* bilateral preventive mastectomy (and therefore no history of breast cancer in any of the breasts)
